alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 13 at 4:51PM PST until January 14 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of continuous snow and gusty winds will create hazardous driving conditions in the advisory area. Travel is discouraged.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
